metadata.title: CVE-2016-3865 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The Synaptics touchscreen driver in Android before 2016-09-05 on Nexus 5Xand 9 devices allows attackers to gain privileges via a craftedapplication, aka internal bug 28799389.

criterions.comment: linux-mako: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-flo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
